alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 5:58PM EST until February 06 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 and Maple Street near the Red River Ranch are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.1 feet by early Saturday morning. - Action stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM.
